EmailTemplate.name: C4B Refer to WES
EmailTemplate.subject: Coursera - Thank you for your interest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Coursera for Business!
Are you ready to uplevel the skills of your team? Our new self-service version of Coursera for Business will have your team up and running in no time!
Our new version of Coursera for Business is catered to small and medium-sized businesses. Based on the information you provided to Coursera, we feel this could be the right fit for your organization.
We look forward to working with you!
The Coursera for Business Team
